author: Simon Difford
description: Whether you love or hate this spirit-forward cocktail will firstly be driven by your preference for mezcal and secondly by whether you appreciate this cocktail's floral violet notes, not to mention the sherry and amaro notes.
name: Madame Mayahuel
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
